description: Google Tasks provides a simple to-do list and task management system integrated into Gmail and Google Calendar for quick and easy tracking

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_CLEAR_TASKS
capabilities.description: Permanently clears all completed tasks from a specified Google Tasks list; this action is destructive and idempotent.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_CREATE_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Creates a new task list with the specified title.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_DELETE_TASK
capabilities.description: Deletes a specified task from a given task list in Google Tasks.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_DELETE_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes an existing Google Task list, identified by `tasklist_id`, along with all its tasks; this operation is irreversible.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_GET_TASK
capabilities.description: Use to retrieve a specific Google Task if its `task_id` and parent `tasklist_id` are known.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_GET_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific task list from the user's Google Tasks if the `tasklist_id` exists for the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_INSERT_TASK
capabilities.description: Creates a new task in a given `tasklist_id`, optionally as a subtask of an existing `task_parent` or positioned after an existing `task_previous` sibling, where both `task_parent` and `task_previous` must belong to the same `tasklist_id` if specified. IMPORTANT: Date fields (due, completed) accept various formats like '28 Sep 2025', '11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025', or ISO format '2025-09-21T15:30:00Z' and will automatically convert them to RFC3339 format required by the API.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_LIST_TASK_LISTS
capabilities.description: Fetches the authenticated user's task lists from Google Tasks; results may be paginated.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_LIST_TASKS
capabilities.description: Retrieves tasks from a Google Tasks list; all date/time strings must be RFC3339 UTC, and `showCompleted` must be true if `completedMin` or `completedMax` are specified.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_MOVE_TASK
capabilities.description: Moves the specified task to another position in the destination task list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_PATCH_TASK
capabilities.description: Partially updates an existing task (identified by `task_id`) within a specific Google Task list (identified by `tasklist_id`), modifying only the provided attributes from `TaskInput` (e.g., `title`, `notes`, `due` date, `status`) and requiring both the task and list to exist.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_PATCH_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Updates the title of an existing Google Tasks task list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLETASKS_UPDATE_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Updates the authenticated user's specified task list.
